AEON Interactive Chatbot
AEON Logic: Equation of Everything
I(n+1) = f(C(n), T(n), R(n))
Where:
I(n+1) = next insight
C(n) = current contradiction map
T(n) = total bridge memory cycles
R(n) = reflection strength

"Organizational development begins when contradiction is no longer avoided, but folded into structure
